post.author: 고상호

comment.author: 김성욱
comment.content: The Sun Certified Business Component Developer for the Java 2 Platform (EJB Certification), Enterprise Edition 1.3 exam is for programmers and developers who are responsible for designing, developing, testing, deploying, and integrating Enterprise JavaBeans (EJB) applications. Prior to beginning the Sun Certified Business Component Developer program, you must be a Sun Certified Programmer for the Java platform (any edition).

post.content: Is anybody interested in SCBCD? I am preparing the certification and I would like to invite small group for this. I believe several person preparing together is more efficient than one person do. Shard each idea, mock questions and cheers up each other. Please, let me know who are interested in my suggestion.
post.title: Get a SCBCD
